ygData.subject: Re: Science lab
ygData.msgSnippet: Squizzy:: She nodded and started to go through Feline s memory banks. She started to delete everything assosiated with HotRod. She smiled. She will be ready

Squizzy::

She nodded and started to go through Feline's memory banks. She 
started to delete everything assosiated with HotRod. She smiled. "She 
will be ready soon. She won't even know this bot called HotRod." 

She finished deleting the information and uploaded a combatant 
program to make her a more effeciant fighter.  

Squizzy finished and walked  over to the table. She unhooked Feline 
and looked her over. "She will wake up soon.  Tell Zardus that she 
will be ready in an hour or soon as she wakes up."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Repressor::
> 
> Repressor nods to Squizzy, sitting back.
> 
> "Zardus," he says into his comm, "Feline is being reprogrammed. 
> Anything else you need?"
> 
> "Yes," Zardus' voice replies, "Tell Squizzy to remove any memories 
of 
> HotRod she may have. He seems to have turned a bit soft on us."
> 
> Repressor nods, walking over to Squizzy. "Zardus says to take out 
her 
> memories of HotRod," he says to her, watching Feline sleep, "Can 
you 
> do that?"
>
